description: This file defines a React functional component named Sidebar, which provides a user interface for searching images and filtering by tags in an image gallery application.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: React functional component that renders a sidebar with search input and tag filters, accepting props for handling search and filter actions.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Handles form submission for search input, prevents default behavior, and calls the onSearch callback with the current search value.
